name: Amplified Enhancement: Ousia
description:
Your characters deal +1 DMG.
When your active character takes DMG that is not Arkhe: Pneuma aligned: Negate 2 DMG.
After your active character takes DMG that is Arkhe: Pneuma aligned: A Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction occurs, and remove this effect.
